# Introduction

This dataset contains data from jobs listing around NYC, and is collected from the City od New York's official jobs website. 
Various features about jobs is provided, including "Business title", "Agency", "number of positions", "level", "job categoty", 
"Full time/Part time", "Salary Range from"ï¼Œ "Salary Range to", "Title Code Number" and so on. 

There are many interesting things to discover, such as what kinds of jobs tend to have a higher salary, whether a higher level
job has a higher salary, which location tends to pay more.
